Value.Name: LaserGun
Value.MassFormula: Ability('Power Input') / 1000 + Ability('Chamber Volume') + Ability('Radiator Volume')

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Range
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: (Legacy) Maximum range at which the laser can fire at

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Damage
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: (Legacy) Energy output of laser pulse

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: ReloadRate
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: (Legacy) How much of a delay there is between laser pulses

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Power Input
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: How much power the laser consumes

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Chamber Volume
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Volume of the chamber

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Lens Diameter
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Diameter of a laser

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Charge Period
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: How much of a delay there is between laser pulses

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Duty Cycle
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: What percentage of the lasers charge perioid is spent firing

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Target Wavelength
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: What the wavelength of the output energy weapon is

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Focal Length
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Distance to target (debug)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Emissitivity
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: How emissive radiators are (tech)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Radiator Volume
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Volume of the chamber

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Radiator Thickness
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: How thick radiators are (debug)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Radiator area
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: How much area radiators have (debug)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Operating Temprature
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: What temp the laser operates at

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Input Light
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Energy out put of a laser pulse

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Chamber Absorption
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: What percentage of stored light in the chamber is lost as heat (tech)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Conversion Efficency
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: What percentage of input energy gets converted into light (tech)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Lense Emission
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: What percentage of stored light is fired (tech)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Pulse Energy
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Energy output of a laser pulse
ComponentAtbSDs.AbilityFormula: Ability('Lense Emission') * (Ability('Input Light') - Ability('Input Light') * Exp(Ability('Chamber Absorption') * -1 * Ability('Charge Period'))) / Ability('Chamber Absorption')

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Thermal Output
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Waste Thermal heat output by laser
ComponentAtbSDs.AbilityFormula: (Ability('Power Input') * Ability('Charge Period') - Ability('Pulse Energy')) / Ability('Charge Period')

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Beam waist
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Width of beam at focal length (debug)
ComponentAtbSDs.AbilityFormula: Ability('Operating Temprature') * Ability('Operating Temprature') * Ability('Focal Length') * 0.000000001 * Ability('Target Wavelength') * ( 1 / Ability('Lens Diameter') )

Value.Name: RailGun
Value.Description: A Projectile thrower that uses electrical energy to propel a conductive projectile

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Calibre
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Caliber of this weapon in mm

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Rail Length
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Length of the rail - directly effects the final velocity of the projectile

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Auto Reloader Mass
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: Increases the mass of the weapon, but increases the rate of fire.

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Power Use
ComponentAtbSDs.Description: In MegaJules.

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: dbargs
ComponentAtbSDs.AbilityFormula: DataBlobArgs(Ability('Calibre'), Ability('Rail Length'), Ability('Power Use'), Ability('Power Efficiency'), Ability('ROF'))
